Text:
The melody does sound good. The beat after the melody, is quite fast in my opinion. If you could replace it with one which is a bit slower.

Also it would be better if you could also use sounds(samples?) which have a longer touch/sound. Now the sounds are making it very "full" because they are short and many after each other. If those sounds are a bit longer, and less in number; it will still be equally spread(no silent parts) and it will not have the feeling of too "full"/"many" .

I don't have such an knowledge about composing/producing music. And my knowledge of the English language in the music area is limited, so hopefully you understand what I mean.
